title: Brazil’s Unvaccinated President Goes Into Quarantine After Return From New York
sub_head: A member of Jair Bolsonaro’s delegation to U.N. General Assembly tested positive for Covid-19 virus
body:
SÃO PAULO—President Jair Bolsonaro was self-isolating after a member of his delegation tested positive for the virus that causes Covid-19 during the Brazilian leader’s trip to attend the United Nations General Assembly in New York.
Brazil’s health authority, Anvisa, sent a written request to the presidential palace Wednesday that the president and the rest of his delegation go into isolation after Health Minister Marcelo Queiroga announced Tuesday on Twitter that he had tested positive for Covid-19.
